MatomoAnalyticsDisableCookie.description: Boolean. Whether or not to disable cookies being set by Matomo.

MatomoAnalyticsDisableJS.description: Boolean. Whether or not to add Javascript tracking code to pages.

MatomoAnalyticsEnableCustomDimensionsUse.description: Boolean. Whether to fetch userType in Matomo using CustomDimensions. You must setup CustomDimensions to be able to use this.

MatomoAnalyticsForceGetRequest.description: Boolean. Whether or not you want to foce GET requests which also disables beacon. Reverts back to Matomo v3 tracking behavior.

MatomoAnalyticsGlobalID.description: Integer. If tracking more than one site, this is an ID to attach to all wikis for central aggregate statistics.

MatomoAnalyticsServerURL.description: String. URL of the Matomo installation to use for API queries.

MatomoAnalyticsSiteID.description: Integer. If not using database, the site number to add all monitoring to.

MatomoAnalyticsTokenAuth.description: String. The API token for authentication when making requests for data.

MatomoAnalyticsUseDB.description: Boolean. Whether or not to use the database for tracking site IDs.
